PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-14981998-08-260,  ,  ,  ,  FAIT,  INT'L TRADE,  TB,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisAuthority for the Department of Foreign Affairs and International Trade to purchase up to $200,000 worth of Canadian-made gifts in each fiscal year, for presentation to official representatives and foreign dignitaries.
Attachments
precis:
Authority for the Department of Foreign Affairs and International Trade to
purchase up to $200,000 worth of Canadian-made gifts in each fiscal year,
for presentation to official representatives and foreign dignitaries.
